MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH47 postcode area of Bathgate. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown quickly due to an underground cable fault at junction from Gardner crescent and Burnhouse drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:58pm on Saturday, 17 April 2021
